Name: Underground Lords
About the game: Purge the underworld from the demons!. Underground lords is a hardcore rogue-like dungeon crawler with procedurally generated levels. Chose one from 3 characters, gather equipment, and fight waves of demons. Gather the souls of the fallen enemies in order to level up. Get stronger and beat all of the underground lords! Test yourself in unlockable endless mode! 3 Unique Playable Characters 30 items of randomly generated stats and rarity procedurally generated levels 5 unique bosses unlockable endless mode leveling system
